info.name: UISS API documentation
info.description: API documentation for basic CRUD operations for specified requests. All API endpoints are implemented in JSON Schema. The data transaction must be HTTP requests sent via specified url

item.name: Display a listing of the resource.
Add a member to the club.
Get members belonging to a club
Remove the specified resource from storage.
Update the specified resource in storage.
Store a newly created resource in storage.
Get all images in the gallery

request.description: This endpoint retrieves all images in the gallery paginated in chunks of 15.

item.name: Get all images in an album

request.description:
This endpoint deletes an image.
NOTE: This action is irreversible
This endpoint updates an image.
This endpoint creates an image.

body.raw: {"name":"Event 1","description":"This is an event","venue":"Dar es Salaam","image":"image.jpg","startDate":"2021-01-01","endDate":"2021-01-01","hosts":"John Doe, Jane Doe"}

request.description: This endpoint creates a new event.

body.raw: {"name":"Event 1","description":"This is an event","venue":"Dar es Salaam","image":"image.jpg","startDate":"2021-01-01","endDate":"2021-01-01","hosts":"John Doe, Jane Doe"}

request.description: This endpoint updates an event.

This endpoint deletes an event and all it's relations completely.
NOTE: This action is irreversible

item.name: Get all registered users for an event
Register a user for an event

request.description: This endpoint retrieves all members as organised by their roles whether admin or member.

This endpoint updates a project.

item.name: CREATE NEW USER BY REGISTRATION (POST api/register)

request.description: This endpoint enables user to register themselves to the application and at the same time authenticates them on successful registration
Logs-in user(s) to the specified dashboard
Logs-out user(s) from the specified dashboard
Retrieves all users paginated in chunks of 15
Display the specified user
